Package com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils

A few utility classes that could be helpful to any plugin

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Region
    A region defines a collection of a bunch of blocks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Box
    A box is a cuboid region of a single world.
    CombinedRegion
    A combined region takes the union of multiple regions.
    Place
    Designed to be similar to Bukkit's Location class, except is immutable, uses integers and does not have an associated direction.
    Point3D
    An immutable representation of a point in 3D space
    Point3Df
    An immutable representation of a point in 3D space

Package com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils Description

A few utility classes that could be helpful to any plugin
